title: Clone Development Environment for Testing
description: Clone existing dev VM, modify resources, test configuration changes safely

steps.instruction: Check current state of Dev-Environment VM
steps.expected_outcome: Dev-Environment VM found: 8GB RAM, 4 CPUs, state=poweroff

steps.instruction: Create full clone for testing configuration changes
steps.expected_outcome: Full clone created with new UUID and MAC address, 25GB disk space used

steps.instruction: Reduce clone resources for test environment (2GB RAM, 2 CPUs)
Change CPUs to 2 for the test clone
Start test clone to verify it works with reduced resources
steps.expected_outcome: Test clone started successfully with 2GB RAM and 2 CPUs

steps.instruction: Create snapshot of working test configuration
steps.expected_outcome: Snapshot created for test clone baseline

steps.instruction: Verify both VMs are independent and running
steps.expected_outcome: Dev-Environment (poweroff) and Dev-Test-Clone (running) both exist independently

success_criteria: Test clone created with reduced resources, verified working, snapshot taken
cleanup: When testing complete: delete Dev-Test-Clone to free disk space
